description: Embark on an adventurous journey through Sajek Valley, discovering the beauty of nature amidst the hills and indigenous communities.

tourPlan.dayOne: Arrive at Sajek Valley and explore local villages.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Hike to Konglak Hilltop and witness the breathtaking sunset.

description: Experience thrilling beach sports and water activities at the world's longest natural sandy beach.

tourPlan.dayOne: Arrive at Cox's Bazar, enjoy beach sports.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Relax on the beach and indulge in more activities.

description: Embark on a guided walk through the mystic Sundarbans forest, encountering unique wildlife and stunning mangrove landscapes.

tourPlan.dayOne: Arrive at the Sundarbans, begin forest walk.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Explore deeper into the forest and experience wildlife.

description: Embark on an exhilarating wildlife expedition through the Sundarbans, home to the royal Bengal tiger and diverse flora and fauna.

tourPlan.dayOne: Arrive at the Sundarbans, start the wildlife expedition.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Explore various creeks and wildlife habitats.

description: Experience the thrill of hot air ballooning over the picturesque landscapes of Sylhet, unveiling breathtaking views from above.

tourPlan.dayOne: Arrive in Sylhet and prepare for the hot air balloon ride.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Soar through the skies and marvel at scenic vistas.

description: Embark on a trekking adventure to Jaflong, collecting unique stones and witnessing the convergence of natural beauty.

tourPlan.dayOne: Begin the trek to Jaflong and explore the stone collection sites.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Continue the stone collection and enjoy the natural surroundings.

description: Explore the Bandarban hill tracks through an immersive hiking trail, discovering tribal culture and panoramic views.

tourPlan.dayOne: Start the trail and immerse in tribal culture.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Hike to hilltops for panoramic views.

description: Embark on a wildlife adventure in Lawachara National Park, encountering rare species of flora and fauna.

tourPlan.dayOne: Explore the biodiversity of Lawachara National Park.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Hike through the forest and spot wildlife.

description: Enjoy an adventurous beach experience at Kuakata, participating in various thrilling water sports.

tourPlan.dayOne: Arrive at Kuakata and enjoy beach sports.

description: Embark on a trek around Rangamati Lake, discovering pristine beauty and local tribal communities.

tourPlan.dayOne: Commence the trek around Rangamati Lake.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Explore tribal villages and scenic spots.

description: Take a serene walk on Saint Martin's Island, exploring its stunning beaches and tranquil surroundings.

tourPlan.dayOne: Arrive at Saint Martin's Island and begin the walk.
tourPlan.dayTwo: Relax on the beach and explore the island further.

description: Experience the thrill of paragliding over the scenic landscapes of Bandarban, creating unforgettable aerial memories.

tourPlan.dayTwo: Glide through the skies and enjoy breathtaking views.
